attackTableId.Wiki: ID specified by NPC thinking parameters

successDistance.Wiki: For arguments of Common_Attack type subgoals

turnTimeBeforeAttack.Wiki: For arguments of Common_Attack type subgoals

frontAngleRange.Wiki: For arguments of Common_Attack type subgoals

upAngleThreshold.Wiki: For arguments of Common_Attack type subgoals

downAngleThershold.Wiki: For arguments of Common_Attack type subgoals

isFirstAttack.Wiki: Attacks from the second stage of the combo are

doesSelectOnOutRange.AltName: Whether to select outside the proper distance
doesSelectOnOutRange.Wiki: Whether to select when the distance is out of the proper distance

minOptimalDistance.Wiki: Minimum value of proper attack distance

baseDirectionForOptimalAngle1.Wiki: Direction that serves as a reference for the proper angle of attack (XZ plane)

optimalAttackAngleRange1.Wiki: Range of aptitude angles for attacks

baseDirectionForOptimalAngle2.Wiki: Direction that serves as a reference for attack aptitude accuracy (XZ plane)

optimalAttackAngleRange2.Wiki: Range of aptitude angles for attacks

intervalForExec.Wiki: Time required to attack once and then use it again

selectionTendency.Wiki: Specify the ease of selection by magnification

goalLifeMax.AltName: Maximum life span of the goal
goalLifeMax.Wiki: Maximum life span of the goal

doesSelectOnInnerRange.AltName: Whether to select within the appropriate distance
doesSelectOnInnerRange.Wiki: Whether to select when within the appropriate distance

enableAttackOnBattleStart.AltName: Whether to use it as the first hit
enableAttackOnBattleStart.Wiki: Whether to use it as the first hit

doesSelectOnTargetDown.AltName: Whether to select when the target is down
doesSelectOnTargetDown.Wiki: Whether to select when the target is down

comboExecDistance.Wiki: Distance used to determine the execution of attacks from the second stage onward

comboExecRange.Wiki: Distance used to determine the execution of attacks from the second stage onward
